short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to show the length of a playlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows the total duration of a playlist on YouTube or Bilibili.

It works on the playlist view page and the video watch page. You can specify the range of videos to be calculated by entering the start and end index. You can also exclude some videos by unchecking them.

Source Code:
https://github.com/chuenchuen53/playlist-lenght-extension
